trans-unit.source: Represents the look and feel of a column in a table layout.
trans-unit.target: Representa a aparência de uma coluna em um layout de tabela.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnStyle class represents the user interface (UI) characteristics of column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: A classe ColumnStyle representa as características de interface de usuário da coluna em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The styles for all the columns in such a table are collected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Os estilos de todas as colunas em uma tabela desse tipo são coletados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This simple class offers the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> properties for a column.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe simple oferece o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>Propriedades de uma coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes and instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"></xref> class to its default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa e a instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"> </xref> classe ao seu estado padrão.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A>propriedade como 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"> </xref> classe usando fornecido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A>propriedade como 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> indicating how the column should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>indicando como a coluna deve ser deve ser dimensionado em relação a sua tabela contendo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes and instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> and width values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa e a instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"> </xref> classe usando fornecido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"> </xref> e valores de largura.

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of the `width` parameter will vary depending on the `sizeType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O significado exato de `width` parâmetro podem variar de acordo o `sizeType` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> indicating how the column should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>indicando como a coluna deve ser deve ser dimensionado em relação a sua tabela contendo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred width, in pixels or percentage, depending on the `sizeType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A largura preferencial, em pixels ou em porcentagem, dependendo do `sizeType` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: width is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: widthé menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width value for a column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de largura de uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: The `width` parameter will take on different meanings depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `width` parâmetro adotará significados diferentes dependendo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: |`sizeType` value|`width` interpretation| |----------------------|----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|The preferred column width in pixels (fractional portion ignored).| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|Not applicable—the width parameter is ignored.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|The preferred column width as a percentage of the containing table.|
trans-unit.target: | `sizeType` valor | `width` interpretação | |----------------------|----------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>| A largura da coluna preferencial em pixels (parte fracionária ignorado). | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>| Não aplicável, o parâmetro de largura é ignorado. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>| A largura da coluna preferenciais como uma porcentagem da tabela contendo. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>

trans-unit.source: The preferred width, in pixels or percentage, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> property.
trans-unit.target: A largura preferencial, em pixels ou em porcentagem, dependendo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0 when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que 0 ao definir essa propriedade.
